means: 不可原谅的，不可宽恕的

sentence.Network_en: He said the killing of innocent people was inexcusable.
sentence.Network_cn: 他说滥杀无辜是不可原谅的。

sentence.Network_en: The Home Office has been accused of inexcusable incompetence.
sentence.Network_cn: 内政部被指责能力极其低下。

sentence.Network_en: Conditions are good in school. It's inexcusable not to study hard.
sentence.Network_cn: 学校环境好, 不用功念书可说不过去.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 一些翻译~（转的~） ... indignant 义愤的 inexcusable 不可原谅的 infringe 违反，侵犯.
...认为，G20未能涵盖世界重要经济体之一的台湾，是「不可原谅」（inexcusable）的事。
《Friends》词汇表B ... bathed bathedv. 沐浴 inexcusable adj. 没法辩解的, 不可宽赦的 core n. 果核, 中心, 核心.
翻译一个英语句子_百度知道 ...  inexcusable:adj. 不可原谅的不可宽恕的 deceive:v. 欺骗行骗.

list.abs: Levin says it is inexcusable that U.S. taxpayers are continuing to pay for projects that Iraqis are fully capable of funding themselves .列文表示没有理由让美国纳税人继续为伊拉克政府有能力出资的项目付账。
I fear lest we commit an inexcusable blunder .我为我们会犯不可原谅的错误而担忧。
inexcusable conduct , delays , inefficiency ., 不可原谅的行为 , 耽搁 , 低效率.
Reading my diary is an inexcusable invasion of privacy ., 看我的日记是一种不可原谅的侵犯个人隐私的行为.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin inexcusabilis, from in- 'not' + excusabilis 'able to be excused' (see excuse)

entry.tran: 无法辩解的;不可原谅的;不可宽恕的
entry.def: If you say that something is inexcusable, you are emphasizing that it cannot be justified or tolerated because it is extremely bad.

example.ex: He said the killing of innocent people was inexcusable...
example.tran: 他说滥杀无辜是不可原谅的。

example.ex: The Home Office has been accused of inexcusable incompetence.
example.tran: 内政部被指责能力极其低下。

auth_sentence.content: Mark Fischetti for an inexcusable headline that is misleading.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mark Fischetti for an inexcusable headline that is misleading.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mark Fischetti for an inexcusable headline that is misleading.

auth_sentence.content: He said that to do otherwise would be inexcusable.Mr.
auth_sentence.res_content: He said that to do otherwise would be inexcusable.Mr.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He said that to do otherwise would be inexcusable.Mr.

means.word_mean: 不可原谅的, 不可宽恕的

sentences.en: I fear lest we commit an inexcusable blunder.
sentences.cn: 我为我们会犯不可原谅的错误而担忧。
你的行为是不能宽恕的。
